s.text: In the Final Regulatory Flexibility Analysis, there is a lengthy discussion of the steps taken to minimize the burden on small entities and, in particular, a discussion of the reasons why two commenters' proposals were not incorporated into the final rule.
The preamble also contains the need and uses for the collection, the estimated number of respondents, and an estimate of the annual burden hours and costs.

Pursuant to section 801(a)(2)(A) of title 5, United States Code, this is our report on a major rule promulgated by the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), entitled "Foreign Participation in the U.S.

Pursuant to section 801(a)(2)(A) of title 5, United States Code, this is our report on a major rule promulgated by the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), entitled "Foreign Participation in the U.S.

These included indirect foreign investment in C-block and F-block (known as "entrepreneur" blocks) licensees and disregarding investments in common carrier radio licensees by non-carriers held as publicly traded securities.
